title: Debunking the Covid deniers who enter hospitals
description: A man making false statements about Covid-19 tried to remove a sick patient from hospital.

title: Crisp-loving Norfolk parrot flies again after diet
description: Bud's new owner claims the bird could "detect a packet of crisps being opened from four miles away".

title: Sir Tom Jones told he 'wouldn't succeed with curly hair'
description: The Welsh singer said he was "always getting knocked back" in his early career.

title: Covid: Who are the workers 'excluded' from support?
description: Why have some taxpayers who have lost their income because of the pandemic been left without funding?

title: 100,000 Covid deaths: ‘I cursed the sterile white room where Ann died’
description: Already 100,000 people in the UK have died with Covid. This is the story of one of them.
